Name: Further Backgrounding
Power: Add 2 total points to your backgrounds, or 2 new points of backgrounds.

Name: Further Backgrounding
Power: Add 3 total points to your backgrounds, or 3 new points of backgrounds.

Name: Further Backgrounding
Power: Add 2 total points to your backgrounds, or 2 new points of backgrounds. You can raise one background to 7.

Name: Imp. Initiative
Power: +4 to initiative checks.

Name: Linguist
Power: Speak all normal humanoid languages well enough.

Name: Linguist
Power: Speak, read, and write normal languages fluently, and speak bizarre languages no one else can deal with.

Name: Precise Shot
Power: Ranged attacks won’t hit engaged allies.

Power: Quick action to reload heavy crossbow, free action to reload light or hand crossbow.

Power: Once per battle, use a reach weapon in a special way.

Name: Ritual Casting
Power: Cast spells you know as rituals.

Name: Skill Escalation
Power: Add the escalation die to your skill checks after seeing roll, 2/day.

Name: Strong Recovery
Power: Reroll one die when rolling recovery dice. At 5th level, reroll 2 dice. At 8th level, reroll three dice.

Name: Toughness
Power: Gain bonus hp equal to half your class baseline hp, improves at 5th and 8th level.

Name: Cruel
Power: Once per day, use cruel to deal 5 ongoing damage per level against a target you miss or you roll a natural odd attack roll against (even a 1).

Power: Breath weapon now targets 1d3 enemies in a nearby group.

Name: That’s Your Best Shot?
Power: If escalation die is 2+, the best shot recovery is free.

Power: Use d6 and d8 swords without penalties, or if already able to use such swords without penalties, +2 melee damage.

Name: Confounding
Power: Target of confounding is weakened instead of dazed.

Power: Use surprising an extra time, but only to change a nearby ally’s d20 roll.

Name: Evasive

Name: Lethal
Power: If lethal attack reroll is 16+, use lethal again that battle.

Name: Highblood Teleport
Power: When you teleport, deal damage equal to twice your level to engaged enemy.

Name: Halo
Power: Halo now activates whenever you heal using a recovery.

Power: Increase escalation die by +1 when you roll natural 19 or 20 for initiative.

Name: Elven Grace
Power: Start your elven grace rolls with a d4 instead of a d6.

Power: When esc die is 4+, start raging for free as a quick action.

Power: Now start raging for free when esc. die is 3+.

Name: Barbarian Rage
Power: Now start raging for free when esc. die is 2+.

Power: Gain +2 bonus to Barbaric Cleave attacks, and on a hit with Barbaric Cleave, you can heal using a recovery.

Power: You can move for free before using a Barbaric Cleave attack.

Name: Barbaric Cleave
Power: Use Barbaric Cleave as often as you want in one battle.

Power: The bonus damage dice are now d6s instead of d4s.

Power: The bonus damage dice are now d10s instead of d6s.

Power: Use Building Frenzy twice per day now.

Power: Gain +2 bonus to Slayer attacks.

Power: Gain 20 temp hp when your Slayer attack drops a non-mook enemy.

Power: Increase your maximum recoveries by 1.

Power: You gain +1 PD and when you heal using a recovery, you can roll a save.

Power: Increase your maximum recoveries by 1 (2 total).

Power: Add 2 x Con mod to the total healing from the Unstoppable recovery.

Power: The AC bonus also applies to PD.

Power: Add escalation die to Skilled Intercept saves.

Power: On a natural even hit, +2 bonus to AC and PD against the next attack.

Power: As champion feat, but now also +2 MD.

Name: Flying Blade
Power: On a crit, target is also dazed.

Name: Flying Blade
Power: Attack roll doesn’t have to be even for Sneak Attack damage.

Name: Flying Blade
Power: Use flying blade with ranged weapons.

Name: Roll With It
Power: Also triggers on attack vs. PD.

Name: Roll With It
Power: Also triggers on a ranged attack.

Name: Roll With It
Power: Once per day, take damage equal to attacker’s level instead of half damage.

Name: Spiky Bastard
Power: Spiky bastard damage now applies while you’re staggered.

Name: Spiky Bastard
Power: Spiky bastard damage is 15 instead of 10 when esc. die is 3+.

Name: Sure Cut
Power: Missing with sure cut doesn’t count as a use of Sneak Attack damage.

Name: Swift Dodge
Power: Also triggers on attack vs. PD.

Name: Swift Dodge
Power: Rerolled attack takes a –2 penalty.

Name: Swift Riposte
Power: If your attack crits, the enemy misses.

Name: Swift Riposte
Power: Gain a +2 bonus with swift riposte attacks.

Name: True Targeting
Power: Regain your momentum if the invisible enemy’s attack misses.

Name: Breath weapon
Power: Failing a death save doesn’t cancel your breath weapon spells.

Name: Gather Power
Power: Once per battle, you choose a chaotic benefit.

Name: Gather Power
Power: Once per battle, gather power as a quick action if escalation die is 4+.

Name: Gather Power
Power: Roll 2 chaotic benefits if escalation die is 2+.

Name: Arcane Heritage
Power: Use Charisma as the attack ability for wizard spells.

Name: Arcane Heritage
Power: Cast wizard spells empowered.

Name: Blood Link
Power: Gain another relationship point with an icon in your heritage.

Name: Chromatic Heritage
Power: Gain +2 attack bonus with empowered breath weapon spells.

Name: Chromatic Heritage
Power: Once per day, turn a breath weapon re-use failure into a success.

Name: Chromatic Heritage
Power: One battle per day, gain resist dragon attack 16+.

Name: Fey Heritage
Power: Use your Fey Heritage power twice per day now.

Name: Fey Heritage
Power: Gain a +2 attack bonus vs. elves and creatures in elven sphere of influence.

Name: Fey Heritage
Power: Once per battle, gain racial ability of an elf race when esc. die is 6+.

Name: Infernal Heritage
Power: Gain resistance 12+ to fire and one other damage type.

Name: Infernal Heritage
Power: Increase one of your resistances to 16+.

Name: Infernal Heritage
Power: You can enter a spell frenzy as free action for free if esc die is 5+.

Name: Metallic Heritage
Power: Gain resist energy 12+ for rest of battle as quick action. You choose type.

Name: Metallic Heritage
Power: When your chaotic benefit increases your defenses, apply it to an ally.

Name: Metallic Heritage
Power: One battle per day, gain resist demon attack 16+ instead of resist energy.

Name: Sorc’s Familiar
Power: Familiar gains another randomly changing ability.

Name: Sorc’s Familiar
Power: Once per level, familiar can cast one of your expended spells.

Name: Sorc’s Familiar
Power: Familiar gains another randomly changing ability.

Name: Spell Fist
Power: When you miss with spell vs. engaged enemy, add Cha mod to miss damage. Damage increases at each tier.

Name: Spell Fist
Power: Once per battle, include an enemy engaged with you in a spell targeting other foes.

Name: Spell Fist
Power: Once per day, include all enemies engaged with you as targets of an empowered spell.

Name: Undead Heritage
Power: Decrease your total recoveries by 1, gain a +2 bonus to death saves.

Name: Undead Heritage
Power: Increases your resistance to 16+ and attack bonus vs. undead by +1.

Name: Undead Heritage
Power: Gain +1 attack bonus if you cut off hand and put out eye.

Name: Breath of Black
Power: On a miss, ongoing damage is now doubled.

Name: Breath of Blue
Power: The spell can now target a far away enemy.

Name: Burning Hands
Power: On a miss, deal fire damage equal to any die that rolled max.

Name: Burning Hands
Power: Choose another target for spell when you roll a natural 18+.

Name: Burning Hands
Power: Can now target all enemies engaged with you in addition to normal targets.

Name: Calling the Blood
Power: Roll two d6s, then choose the roll you want.

Name: Chaos Bolt
Power: No penalty for attacking a far away enemy.

Name: Chaos Bolt
Power: Roll on epic table for chaotic benefit, or choose it, depending on tier.

Name: Echoing Thunder
Power: Empowering echoing thunder doubles its aftershock damage.

Name: Lightning Fork
Power: Once per battle, reroll a lightning fork attack.

Name: Lightning Fork
Power: Lightning fork not expended if you miss all targets.

Name: Lightning Fork
Power: Recharge roll is now 11+.

Name: Resist Energy
Power: Add another target with the spell.

Name: Scorching Ray
Power: You can now target far away enemies, but with a –2 penalty.

Name: Scorching Ray
Power: The spell attack can deal random energy damage instead of fire.

Name: Scorching Ray
Power: No penalty for attacking a far away enemy.

Name: The Elven Shadows
Power: Once per battle, you can instead teleport to a far away location you can see.

Name: Ritual Magic
Power: Can cast full rituals in 1d3 + 1 rounds.

Name: Abjuration
Power: Bonus also applies to PD.

Name: Abjuration
Power: Gain 2d12 temp hp when you cast a daily spell.

Name: Abjuration
Power: Bonus also applies to MD.

Name: Cantrip Mastery
Power: You can now use cantrip-style versions of any spell you know.

Name: Evocation
Power: When you evoke, reroll one natural attack roll that is less than esc. die.

Name: High Arcana
Power: You can now cast counter-magic twice per battle.

Name: High Arcana
Power: You can cast counter-magic in reaction to any magical action.

Name: Color Spray
Power: The weakened effect hp threshold increases by 5 hp.

Name: Color Spray
Power: On a miss, deal damage equal to your level.

Name: Color Spray
Power: The spell now targets 1d3 + 1 creatures.

Name: Confusion
Power: You can choose a new miss effect that dazes all missed targets.

Name: Confusion
Power: Each failed save by the target deals 6d10 psychic damage to it.

Name: Confusion
Power: Confused effect now requires a difficult save (16+).

Name: Denial
Power: The target of the spell is also hampered on a natural even miss.

Name: Denial
Power: The spell now targets 1d4 + 1 enemies.

Name: Disintegrate
Power: The spell now targets a far away creature.

Name: Fireball
Power: Target 1d4 enemies instead of 1d3 when you cast the spell recklessly.

Name: Fireball
Power: The spell now targets 1d3 + 1 enemies.

Name: Force Salvo
Power: You can now target one creature with bolts until you hit it once.

Name: Force Salvo
Power: On a miss, deal damage equal to level with a bolt.

Name: Force Salvo
Power: Increase the number of bolts by 1.

Name: Hold Monster
Power: Regain the spell if you miss all targets with it.

Name: Hold Monster
Power: The spell can now target 2 enemies under the hp limit.

Name: Hold Monster
Power: Increase the hp limit by +50 hp.

Name: Lightning Bolt
Power: Deal 10 ongoing lightning damage on a natural even hit.

Name: Lightning Bolt
Power: Deal 20 ongoing lightning damage (hard save) on a natural even hit.

Name: Magic Missile
Power: Now choose two targets for the spell, each getting half damage dice.

Name: Magic Missile
Power: Roll a d20 with the spell to see if you crit.

Name: Magic Missile
Power: Use d8s instead of d4s for damage dice at spell levels 7 and 9.

Name: Meteor Swarm
Power: Damage from each meteor is now 5d4 x 10.

Name: Ray of Frost
Power: On a natural even hit, daze the target if it’s staggered.

Name: Ray of Frost
Power: The spell’s target can now be far away.

Name: Ray of Frost
Power: You can have the spell deal lightning or negative energy damage.

Name: Rebuke
Power: Deal double your level psychic damage when you roll a natural even hit.

Name: Rebuke
Power: Also daze a target (save ends) you hit with the spell.

Name: Rebuke
Power: Daze a target for a round when you roll a natural even miss.

Name: Shield
Power: You choose which attack roll the attacker must use.

Name: Shield
Power: The spell’s recharge roll is now 6+.

Name: Shield
Power: Hit or miss, take only half damage from attack you use shield against.

Name: Shocking Grasp
Power: Cast the spell as a quick action now.

Name: Shocking Grasp
Power: Once per battle, you can also daze a target you hit with the spell.

Name: Shocking Grasp
Power: Use d8s instead of d6s for the spell’s damage dice.

Name: Teleport
Power: You can now cast the spell on nearby allies, if allies are close, you can teleport to a location known by an ally.

Name: Teleport Shield
Power: When your teleport shield attack misses, the attack isn’t expended that round.

Name: Teleport Shield
Power: You can now teleport an enemy to a location far away you can see.

Name: Utility Spell
Power: Each utility spell slot lets you cast two spells.

Name: Utility Spell
Power: Each utility spell slot lets you cast three spells.

Name: Wizard’s Familiar
Power: Familiar gains another ability.

Name: Wizard’s Familiar
Power: Once per level, your familiar can cast one of your expended spells.

Name: Wizard’s Familiar
Power: Familiar gains another ability.
